title: SLFP to submit a request letter to President on crises
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Sri Lanka Freedom Party (SLFP) stated that a letter will be handed over to the President on Saturday (2) requesting immediate solutions to the major problems faced by the people.
The Propaganda Secretary to the Sri Lanka Freedom Party, Shantha Bandara said that this action will be taken as per the decision of the party central committee which met on Friday (1) night.
Sri Lankan President declares Public Emergency with effect from 1st April
21 Mirihana Protestors granted bail; 6 others remanded to 4th April for identification parade
